page.title: 06TARRINGTON VILLAGE SHOP
page.content: The shop has been in Tarrington for 50 years,2 years as a Post Office. Its suplies come from Hereford, Malvern,Northampton,Tewkesbury and Gloucester. Deliveries are made to Stoke Edith, Bartestree,Hereford,Checkley,Putley, Pixley,Ashperton,Stretton Grandison, Canon Frome,Monkhide and Tarrington. Shop opening times are 8am-1pm Mon to Fri; 8am-1pm Sat. It sells groceries,bread,corn,eggs, icecream,greengrocery,frozen foods, confectionery,tobacco,cigarettes,soap, shoe laces & polish,washing powders, toothpaste,pet food,newspapers and magazines. They used to deliver by horse and cart but now use a motor van. The postman collects mail at 8.30am and 3.15pm Mon to Fri.,8.30am on Sat.
